channel.title: Let's Crypto on Unclefish
channel.description: Recent content in Let's Crypto on Unclefish

item.title: Emotions are in place[Weekly Report]
item.description:
Uncle Fish’s blockchain weekly report brings you a weekly summary of information.

Time: 10.30 - 11.05

Keyword of the week: *** Musk, Twitter, rate hike, GALA, HK***

item.title: When everyone is crazy about web3.0, I'm going to pour cold water on it
item.description: Hello, everyone, I’m Uncle Fish. Recently, many Singaporean friends around me have come to ask me “how is the web3 startup?”, or some investors have asked me “Should I invest in the web3 project?” .

item.title: 纳瓦尔宝典
item.description: 状态：已读完； 类别：财经 / 自我提升； 推荐程度：4.8/5 「强烈推荐」 一句话短评：有种「原则」和「穷查理宝典」合集的韵味，后劲十足值得反复阅读

item.title: [付费栏目]鱼叔的咨询群
item.description: hello，大家好，我是鱼叔。 21年我试运营了一个咨询群，已经满一年。期间很多朋友都有所收获，令我欣慰的是越来越的读者不再盲目跟风，知道如何

item.title: Discuss the value of web3 from the perspective of decentralization
item.description: Hello, everyone, I’m Uncle Fish. This article may be a little sensitive, and I may encounter 404. As a researcher of a blockchain project, I still want to express my feelings about some things in Shanghai.

item.title: 2021 鱼叔的投资报告
item.description: hello，大家好，我是鱼叔，这篇文章是我2021年的投资回顾，这篇文章主要分成三个部分： 2021 币圈发生的大事统计 鱼叔的投资策略及变化思路 未来2

item.title: CONSULT
item.description: WHAT CAN I HELP YOU hi, I am Unclefish, a writer aim to popularize rational investment in the crypto world. I have been in the crypto market for almost ten years. After experiencing the ups and downs of bulls and bears, and the life and death of countless projects, I feel that cognition is the only magic weapon that can take me through time and defeat the market. I founded the brand Unclefish in 2021.
